Title: Batman the Movie

Released: 1966

Size: 1.21GB
Genre: Action, Comedy, Suspense

Plot: Batman (Adam West) and Robin (Burt Ward) square off against the forces of evil; Joker, Riddler, Penguin and Cat Woman in a suspenseful action adventure. Penguin has invented a devise that instantly dehydrates anyone it's pointed at and uses it to diabolically evaporate the members of the United Nations Alliance. Batman and Robin are immediately summoned by Commissioner 
Gordon (Neil Hamilton) for help to save the world from these notorious
criminals.

Starring: Adam West, Burt Ward, Lee Meriwether, Cesar Romero, Burgess Merideth, Frank Gorshin, Alan Napier, Neil Hamilton, Stafford Repp and others.
